name: github
title: GitHub
description: Manage GitHub issues, pull requests, and repositories.

handle.title: GitHub Handle
handle.description: The GitHub handle of the user

id.title: GitHub User ID
id.description: The GitHub ID of the user

nodeId.title: GitHub User Node ID
nodeId.description: The GraphQL Node ID of the user

profileUrl.title: GitHub Profile URL
profileUrl.description: The URL of the user's profile

issueOpened.title: Issue opened
issueOpened.description: Triggered when an issue is opened

pullRequestMerged.title: Pull Request merged
pullRequestMerged.description: Triggered when a pull request is merged

pullRequestOpened.title: Pull Request opened
pullRequestOpened.description: Triggered when a pull request is opened

pullRequestReviewSubmitted.title: Pull Request review submitted
pullRequestReviewSubmitted.description: Triggered when a review is submitted on a pull request

pullRequest.title: Pull Request
pullRequest.description: A pull request in a GitHub repository

repoOwnerId.title: Repository Owner ID
repoOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the repository owner

repoOwnerName.title: Repository Owner Name
repoOwnerName.description: Name of the repository owner. Usually the organization name

pullRequestReviewComment.title: Pull Request Review Comment
pullRequestReviewComment.description: A comment on a pull request review in a GitHub repository

repoOwnerId.title: Repository Owner ID
repoOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the repository owner

repoOwnerName.title: Repository Owner Name
repoOwnerName.description: Name of the repository owner. Usually the organization name

lastCommentId.title: Last Comment ID
lastCommentId.description: The ID of the last comment posted on the review thread

repoOwnerId.title: Repository Owner ID
repoOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the repository owner

repoOwnerName.description: Name of the repository owner. Usually the organization name

discussion.title: Discussion

repoOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the repository owner

repoOwnerName.title: Repository Owner Name

discussionCategoryId.description: Unique identifier of the discussion category

repoOwnerId.title: Repository Owner ID
repoOwnerId.description: Unique identifier of the repository owner
